title: PostgreSQL Database Completer
description: Settings for PostgreSQL database autocomplete in JupyterLab. Uses jupysql connections.ini for database configuration.

enabled.title: Enable PostgreSQL completions
enabled.description: Enable or disable PostgreSQL table and column completions

connectionName.title: Connection Name
connectionName.description: Connection name from connections.ini file. Leave empty to use the active jupysql connection from the notebook kernel, or the first available connection.

schema.title: Database Schema
schema.description: PostgreSQL schema to query for table and column names
